mapper.select: SELECT program.code AS pcode, program.name AS pname, program.cat1 AS c1code, cat1.name AS c1name, program.cat2 AS c2code, cat2.name AS c2name, program.agency AS acode, agency.name AS aname, ifnull(agency.manager,'') AS manager, ifnull(agency.tel,'') AS tel FROM program JOIN cat1 ON program.cat1=cat1.code JOIN cat2 ON program.cat2=cat2.code AND program.cat1=cat2.cat1 JOIN agency ON program.agency=agency.code WHERE program.code=#{code};

SELECT program.code AS pcode, program.name AS pname, program.cat1 AS c1code, cat1.name AS c1name, program.cat2 AS c2code, cat2.name AS c2name, program.agency AS acode, agency.name AS aname, ifnull(agency.manager,'') AS manager, ifnull(agency.tel,'') AS tel FROM program JOIN cat1 ON program.cat1=cat1.code JOIN cat2 ON program.cat2=cat2.code AND program.cat1=cat2.cat1 JOIN agency ON program.agency=agency.code WHERE program.area=#{area};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program(area, name, cat1, cat2, agency) VALUES (#{area}, #{name}, #{cat1}, #{cat2}, #{agency});
